downloadTitle: System Center 2022 Integration Pack for Active Directory
downloadDescription: The Integration Pack for Active Directory is an add-on for System Center 2022 Orchestrator that enables you to automate common Active Directory management functions.
detailsSection:
The Integration Pack for Active Directory is an add-on for System Center 2022 Orchestrator that enables you to connect Orchestrator to your Active Directory Server to automate its management.
Release History
  • 06/30/2022 - Original English release, version 10.22.1.1
systemRequirementsSection:
• System Center 2022 - Orchestrator
  • Windows Server 2019 or higher
  • .NET Framework 4.0 or higher (.NET 4.7.2 recommended)
installInstructionSection: Download the .oip file, register the Integration Pack in Deployment Manager and then deploy the Integration Pack on Runbook Designer and Runbook Server.
